title: Artery Forceps
full: Used to clamp blood vessels and control bleeding during surgery.

title: Needle Holder
full: Used to hold and guide suture needles while suturing tissue.

title: Scalpel Handle
full: Used to hold surgical blades for making precise incisions.

title: Bone Holding Forceps
full: Used to hold and stabilize bone fragments during orthopedic procedures.

title: Retractor
full: Used to retract tissue and provide better visibility during surgery.
